questions.question: What is the meaning of the word insignia?

choices.answer: a mark or sign to represent a specific thing
balanced and ready to move
a complicated network of hallways or paths
a really cute puppy

questions.question: Basketball is the best sport in the world.

choices.answer: True: Basketball is life.
False: All sports are ballin'.

questions.question: What is the meaning of the word labyrinth?

choices.answer: that's not a real word
a complicated network of hallways or paths
relating to ideas about life and existence; beyond physical
balanced and ready to move

questions.question: Which phrase from the poem is an allusion to a Greek myth that involves a complicated system of moving around?

choices.answer: “Nothing but a hot / Swish of strings like silk”
“In the roundhouse / Labyrinth our bodies / Created”
“we could almost / Last forever, poised in midair”
“The skullcap of hope & good / Intention.”

choices.answer: a mark or sign to represent a specific thing
balanced and ready to move
relating to ideas about life and existence; beyond physical

questions.question: What is the meaning of the word rhythm?

choices.answer: a regular pattern of sounds or movements
a good boogie song
a complicated network of hallways or paths
a mark or sign to represent a specific thing
facts about a topic in a passage
an image you see that isn't actually there
a type of comparison
a reference to a person, place, thing, or idea

questions.question: Which one of these lines from the poem represent a biblical allusion about creatures that have fallen from grace?

choices.answer: “We outmaneuvered to footwork / Of bad angels.”
“A high note hung there / A long second.”
“We'd corkscrew / Up & dunk balls”
“Lanky, all hands / & feet . . . sprung rhythm.”

questions.question: ELA class is the best class.

choices.answer: True. Duh.
Very True.
